entry.p: The current issue of the Journal of Ayn Rand Studies has hit the streets, including a short contribution by yours truly to a roundtable discussion of philosophical thinking on progressive rock (entitled "Saying Yes to Rand and Rock"). Come back in three or four months and I will have posted it online. (Isn't the future perfect just the greatest tense?) This issue also includes an essay by Dave Jilk on the nature of entities, which I'm looking forward to reading.
